content.text:
# 1992 Pilkington Glass Championships – Singles

Lori McNeil
| runner   =  Linda Harvey Wild
| score    = 6–4, 6–4
| type     = singles doubles
| main_name = Eastbourne International
| after_name = Volkswagen Cup
| draw     = 64 (3/8/2)
| seeds    = 16
}}
Martina Navratilova was the defending champion, but lost in the second round to Linda Harvey Wild.
Lori McNeil won the title by defeating Harvey Wild 6–4, 6–4 in the final.
Seeds
Martina Navratilova (second round)
#  Mary Joe Fernández (semifinals)
#  Conchita Martínez (third round)
#  Jana Novotná (quarterfinals)
#  Zina Garrison (first round)
#  Nathalie Tauziat (quarterfinals)
#  Helena Suková (quarterfinals)
#  Kimiko Date (second round)
#  Amy Frazier (first round)
#  Gigi Fernández (first round)
#  Lori McNeil (champion)
#  Natasha Zvereva (withdrew)
#  Brenda Schultz (first round)
#  Natalia Medvedeva (second round)
#  Pam Shriver (third round)
#  Manon Bollegraf (first round)
}}
